column2: "A service by AWS to centrally manage and enforce policies across multiple AWS accounts."

column1: What is the primary benefit of AWS Organizations?
What are Service Control Policies (SCPs) in AWS Organizations?
column2: "They define which AWS services and actions can be used within the accounts in an organization."

column1: What are Organizational Units (OUs) in AWS Organizations?
column2: "Groups of AWS accounts that can be used to apply policies at a more granular level than at the whole organization level."
